result.title: Requirements and cross-cutting challenges for digital transparency
result.description: This report will provide insight into the different requirements and cross-cutting challenges for the technologies creating transparency. Data will be gathered in the focus groups and during interviews. This data will then be systematically analysed to get insight into the context. The report will contain a BPMN model of the supply chains and interaction between their systems as well as an extensive description of context-dependent requirements and cross-cutting challenges in these supply chains.
